news_header: Israeli forces withdrew from Lebanon but remain in strategic locations.
news_original_title: Villagers begin to return to southern Lebanon as Israeli army withdraws under ceasefire deal
news_text: Israeli forces withdrew from southern Lebanon under a ceasefire agreement but retained presence in five strategic locations. Lebanese leaders condemned this as a violation, while residents faced destruction in their villages. The situation remains tense as reconstruction efforts begin amidst ongoing concerns over security and occupation.
